titles.title: Many Crowd the Savior's Kingdom (hymn of the C

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Many crowd the Saviour's kingdom Few receive His cross Many seek His consolation Few will suffer loss For the dear sake of the Master Counting all by dross For the dear sake of the Master Counting all by dross{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Many sit at Jesus' table Few will fast with Him When the sorrow-cup of anguish Trembles at the brim Few watch with Him in the garden Who have sung the hymn Few watch with Him in the garden Who have sung the hymn{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Many will confess His wisdom Few embrace His shame Many, should He smile upon them Will His praise proclaim Then, if for a while He leave them They desert His name Then, if for a while He leave them They desert His name{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}But the souls who love Him truly Let woe come or bliss These will count their dearest hearts' blood Not their own, but His Saviour, Thou who thus hast loved me Give me love like this Saviour, Thou who thus hast loved me Give me love like this{/lang-eng}
